column54: photos taken at WY during field visit, the WY was constructed by GNPOC  (oil company) in 2003. the water yard serving local community and refugees in the northern districts of El Meiram.
the water yard is inactive now due to a problem in the electric generator, currently under repair.
Borehole ID was renamed as Main BH instead of East BH
Report with bore construction and some testing data but no borehole lithology or aquifer type.
